extendedInfo.detail: Prevents further irritation. Reduces internal swelling, soothes & protects. Prompt, soothing relief from painful burning, itching & discomfort. Also for nighttime relief. Individually quality sealed for protection. Other Information: Store at 20-25 degrees C (68-77 degrees F).  For most recent product information, visit www.preparationh.com. Questions or comments? Call weekdays 9 am to 5 pm EST at 1-800-99PrepH or 1-800-997-7374.
extendedInfo.ingredients: Active Ingredients: Cocoa Butter (88.44 %), Protectant; Phenylephrine HCI (0.25 %), Vasoconstrictor. Inactive Ingredients: Methylparaben, Propylparaben.
extendedInfo.directions: Directions: Detach one suppository from the strip; remove the foil wrapper before inserting into the rectum as follows: Hold suppository with rounded end up. As shown, carefully separate foil tabs by inserting tip of fingernail at end marked 'peel down'. Slowly and evenly peel apart (do not tear) foil by pulling tabs down both sides, to expose the suppository. Remove exposed suppository from wrapper. Insert one suppository into the rectum up to 4 times, especially at night, in the morning or after each bowel movement. Adults: When practical, cleanse the affected area by patting or blotting with an appropriate cleansing wipe. Gently dry by patting or blotting with a tissue or a soft cloth before insertion of this product. Children Under 12 Years of Age: Ask a doctor.
extendedInfo.warnings: Warnings: For rectal use only. Ask a doctor before use if you have: heart disease; high blood pressure; thyroid disease; diabetes; difficulty in urination due to enlargement of the prostate gland. Ask a doctor or pharmacist before use if you are presently taking a prescription drug for high blood pressure or depression. When using this product do not exceed the recommend daily dosage unless directed by a doctor. Stop use and ask a doctor if: bleeding occurs; condition worsens or does not improve within 7 days. If pregnant or breast-feeding, ask a health professional before use. Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away. Do not use if foil imprinted 'PREPARATION H' is torn or damaged.
